model.name: tidyMarkup
model.title: TidyMarkup
model.description: Parse (potentially invalid) HTML into valid HTML or DOM.
model.label: dataformat,transformation

dataObjectType.description: What data type to unmarshal as, can either be org.w3c.dom.Node or java.lang.String. Is by default org.w3c.dom.Node

omitXmlDeclaration.description: When returning a String, do we omit the XML declaration in the top.
